Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.label: Hermano
Vehicles.VehicleBuildDef.description: A dedicated refrigeration vehicle, the Hermano is a decent cargo transporter with a specific niche in ferrying perishable goods. Decent in long-range travel along roads, it performs terribly in off-road or winter conditions.\n\nWhile there are better cargo transporters even in lower tiers, this truck can transport cargo in a frozen state, preventing spoilage. Due to the extra machinery, performance suffers and it should stay away from conflict zones.
